thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 10 of 260
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I was shopping around for an Android tablet with a cellular connection. I received the Groupon offer at exactly the right time. The price was right, lower than other options I was exploring. The tablet is great! It had the added bonus of having the latest Android version installed. This was not the case with the other tablet sources. High quality product, low price and quick delivery. How's the for a review?
